embed.title: Commands:
embed.description:
PyBot can run code, play games and much more
Here's some commands to get started.

fields.name: `To Run code:`
fields.value:
```txt
React to the code block with:```
 :zap:
 :point_up:Still under work...

fields.name: `>languages/langs/lang`
fields.value: ```Displays the languages that can be run by the bot.```

fields.name: `>cats/cat/CATS`
fields.value:
```Displays a cute picture/gif of a cat.
PS: Sorry dog people.```
